com.ubudu.indoorlocation

Class UbuduIndoorLocationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ubudu.indoorlocation.UbuduIndoorLocationManager

  • public class UbuduIndoorLocationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class describing the Indoor Location manager.
    Author:
    mgasztold

        Returns:

        public void loadMapWithKey(java.lang.String key)
        Sets the key of the map that will be fetched at indoor location start.
        Parameters:
        key - key for the map

      • loadMapFromFile

        public void loadMapFromFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Sets the file with the map configuration. This file will be read at indoor location start.
        Parameters:
        filePath - absolute path of the json file containing the map's data

      • loadMapFromUrl

        public void loadMapFromUrl(java.lang.String url)
        Sets the full URL of the map that will be fetched at indoor location start.
        Parameters:
        url - url to the json file containing the map configuration

      • loadMapFromAssetsFile

        public void loadMapFromAssetsFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Sets the file with the map configuration. This file will be read at indoor location start.
        Parameters:
        fileName - namer of the json file containing the map's data located in this app's assets dir.

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts Indoor Location.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops Indoor Location.

      • localizationUpdatesRunning

        public boolean localizationUpdatesRunning()
        Returns:
        true if Indoor Location is running, false if it is stopped.

      • setIndoorLocationDelegate

        public void setIndoorLocationDelegate(UbuduIndoorLocationDelegate delegate)
        Sets the delegate instance in the Indoor Location manager. Methods of this delegate will be invoked by the manager on indoor location events.
        Parameters:
        delegate - delegate object that is to be set in the manager

      • geoCoordinates

        public UbuduCoordinates2D geoCoordinates(UbuduPoint point)
        Parameters:
        point - a point on the map.
        Returns:
        geographical coordinates (latitude, longitude) for the given point. Coordinates are given in degrees.

      • convertPixelDistanceToMeters

        public java.lang.Double convertPixelDistanceToMeters(java.lang.Double distance)
        Parameters:
        distance - pixel distance
        Returns:
        distance scaled to meters

      • setRangedBeaconsNotifier

        public void setRangedBeaconsNotifier(UbuduRangedBeaconsNotifier notifier)
        Sets the notifier which will be called when beacons are ranged within the proximity UUID set in the indoor location map.
        Parameters:
        notifier - notifier instance to be added to the UbuduBeaconManager

      • removeRangedBeaconsNotifier

        public boolean removeRangedBeaconsNotifier(UbuduRangedBeaconsNotifier notifier)
        Removes the notifier from the manager.
        Parameters:
        notifier - notifier instance to be removed
        Returns:
        true if notifier was successfully removed, false otherwise (e.g. if given notifier does not exist in the manager's list).

      • getMapJsonObjectFromKey

        public void getMapJsonObjectFromKey(java.lang.String mapKey,
                                    MapFetchRequestListener listener)
        Parameters:
        mapKey - map key
        listener - JSONObject listener

        public void setMonitoringBetweenScanPeriods(long foregroundPeriod,
                                            long backgroundPeriod)
        Sets the periods between bluetooth scans for foreground state and background state during monitoring.
        Parameters:
        foregroundPeriod - bluetooth scans foreground period
        backgroundPeriod - bluetooth scans background period

        backgroundPeriod - between bluetooth scans background period

        backgroundPeriod - bluetooth scans background period
